thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 34 of 605
thread.title: kat

author: kat
title: kat
text: Customer service isn't the best from experience, especially over the phone. I was on hold for hours and finally gave up. But on the bright side I haven't really needed customer service desperately. Best way to contact is via email. Love the clothes. Great quality. Cute and fun, but also has staple pieces if frilly patterns aren't your style. Not just athletic clothes anymore, but clothes to wear out for the athletic also.
